subject: [Radiance-general] 2010 Radiance workshop dates
body:
As some of you know, Jan Wienhold has offered to host this year's
Radiance workshop at the Fraunhofer Institute for Solar Energy (ISE)
in Freiburg, Germany.

We have been discussing dates for the workshop, and so far, our
favorites are:

September 22nd-24th (Wed-Fri)

Second choice dates would be:

October 6th-8th (also Wed.-Fri.)

We're floating these dates out to the group in case there is an
important conference or conflict that makes the first week
unfavorable.  (It's not so much that we're asking for everyone to vote
their favorite.)  If you do know of a significant conflict with either
set of dates, please write to the list for further discussion.

Cheers,
-Greg
